title: Raxco PerfectDisk 2008 Plus KeyGen (Build 9.00 Build 52)
description:
As stated in the readme, all credits go to TICI333 (http://thepiratebay.se/user/TICI333)
EDIT: he no longer seems to be active on The Pirate Bay, maybe due to his malware included in the software? At the time I upped this torrent he actually had a impressive list of upped software.

His executable contained a trojan (Vundo), so I replaced it with an executable which I downloaded directly from Raxco. I left the updates away (since the new executable already has these. This is my first torrent so do not complain if something does not work out properly (with downloading I mean, the files themselves are OK).

Have Fun!

EDIT2: For you folks out there that want a "real" free and decent defragger I suggest you check out this lightweight and portable program found on the following link: http://www.kessels.com/Jkdefrag/ or here: http://www.emro.nl/freeware/ for the one with a nice GUI (the first one is a bit more with command lines etc.)
To be real honest, I've been using it recently more then I've been using Raxco's one... But they both have their pro's and con's.

Anyway, thnx 2 the seeders for keeping this alive....
